item.title: Five Parsecs from Home: Planetfall Tasks You With Colonizing an Alien World
item.content:encoded:
Modiphius Entertainment has announced that a new game is now available for pre-order. Five Parsecs from Home: Planetfall is a new entry in their sci-fi skirmish series, one that tasks you with strategically colonizing an alien planet.

The Five Parsecs from Home: Planetfall Pre-Order Announcement

According to an official press release, Five Parsecs from Home: Planetfall is a co-op adventure game. Players take on the role of colonizers, scientists, and explorers from the mighty Unity of Humankind as they build a colony on an alien world. An alien world packed with crashed spaceships, dangerous ancient ruins, and hostile indigenous lifeforms.

Players will need to direct their colony's expansion, commit to research projects, and command units in tactical miniature combat., You can use any miniatures for these skirmishes, using a small handful of units for each encounter. 

Over time, these colonists will gain experience, receive improved combat abilities, and even develop tech upgrades. The game can be played as either a solo or two-player co-op experience.

If you have other rulebooks from other Five Parsecs from Home books, including Tactics and Bug Hunt, the new rules are fully compatible. This means if you want to tell a big, multilayered space opera narrative across different fronts and venues, you can do so.

A copy of Five Parsecs from Home: Planetfall contains the following:

  • Simple, easy-to-learn rules, allowing for an accessible single-player experience
  • Random tables packed with alien artifacts, colony events, crises, and more
  • 14 mission types that range from exploration to combat to navigating alien ruins
  • Tactical enemy types. These include pirates, renegades, outlaws, alien raiders, K'Erin landing parties, converted recon teams, and even hostile colonists.
  • An in-depth research system with 13 scientific theories, 40 buildings, and 8 unlockable augmentations
  • A unique encounter table packed with evolving alien lifeforms
  • Multiple possible endings for your colony

Five Parsecs from Home: Planetfall is available now on Modiphius' webstore at an MSRP of $55. Physical copies of the game are expected to ship in February 2026.
